info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 03 at 4:53PM MDT by NWS Albuquerque
info.description: ...A STRONG THUNDERSTORM WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF SOUTHEASTERN LINCOLN AND CENTRAL CHAVES COUNTIES THROUGH 515 PM MDT... At 451 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles east of Tinnie, or 26 miles west of Roswell, moving north-northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Sunset and U.S. Highways 70 and 380. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If threatening weather approaches your area, take shelter in a sturdy building.
